title: Yesterday i flamed the potatos out of my jungler.
body:
Yesterday i was playing a game in a diamond 3 solo q game and i decided to flame my jungler. 
Lol now before i get the riot specialists like the djinn here criticizing me for flaming regardless of circumstances i'd like to say that i am not a habitually toxic player and i'm actually relatively friendly in 90% of my games. 

but this game man i really hated this player. 
Maybe it's because of my bias as a jungle player that i place certain "standards" on junglers of my elo to be able to know what they're doing. 

Yes, yes i know that flaming is bad regardless of circumstances but sometimes it just gets really hard to watch a "bad player" you know?
By bad player i don't mean they feed their lane or make a mechanical mistake like fail a flash over the wall. When i see this i just think that it's a bad game and every player is bound to get some of those. But this jarvan, man he made me flame so hard that i'm here on the boards to flame more about this game. 

SO THIS JARVAN. Let's start with champ select, right from the beginning of the game i had a bad vibe from this guy as he wasn't a jungle main and refused to communicate both bot and mid asked if he wanted swap ( as they were jungle mains ) He doesn't say anything and locks in jarvan so we assume he knows what he's doing. Fast forward into the game. I burn both kayle's flash and her teleport at level 3 and get a solo kill onto her while jarvan FULL CLEARS HIS JUNGLE (who the fuck does that on jarvan) he then proceeds to run bot and try and dive the support under the turret only to miss his e q and die. Whatever. it's annoying but im not tilted at him, i just think it's unlucky. Knowing that Jarvan is going to be topside now to clear his krugs again, i set up an extremely punishing wave against kayle and make every circumstance right for jarvan to come top, e q under the turret to dive kayle and get out. ( i placed a pink ward in the bush, chunked kayle to below 40% health, was 2 levels above her with level 6 while she was level 4, and had a huge minion wave with at least 15+ minions crashing to her turret while she was sitting there with NO SUMMONER SPELLS. So i ping jarvan and tell him to come top BECAUSE THIS IS WHAT I EXPECT PLAYERS ON MY ELO TO AT LEAST KNOW WHAT TO DO AS A JUNGLER. This man fucking walks his fat ass over to his krugs, clears it and then says "do you see my health" (he was at 50% health) and proceeds to walk towards his raptors. I was getting tilted at this point but i keep it to myself and just dive kayle by myself under the turret, i solo kill her and was going to get away but then their jungle shows up and gets a return kill on me. MEANWHILE bot lane has died twice from both the adc and the support and jarvan runs bot lane again and ints 1v2 AGAIN.  (at this point now i'm thoroughly tilted) i continue with the game and get 2 more solo kills before i get a barrage of 4 man ganks toplane along with a rift herald from their jungler. At this point their kayle starts talking shit in all chat and TRIES TO TEACH ME HOW TO PLAY AATROX LOL WHEN I SOLO KILLED HIS ASS 3 TIMES. (mental going boom now) their jungler has secured the rift herald, 3 infernals and 2 turrets in the bot lane the entire time while jarvan was in the jungle. (WHAT IN THE FUCK?) the most funny thing is jarvan starts calling for reports on the bot lane for feeding when he's doing equally bad kda wise but 100x worse macro play and brain cell wise. At this point i'm just thoroughly done with the game, i probably gained a few white hairs playing with this jarvan but its alright i just wanted to leave and he won't even agree to the surrender vote. Below is all the chat logs to what i've said in the game. but the thing that bothers me the most is WHY IS A PLAYER LIKE THIS ALLOWED TO BE IN MY GAME AND RUN AROUND LIKE THIS while im the one getting punished for not being able to handle his lack of brain cells? I'm not even mad at him for feeding, i'm just mad because he's a total r%%%%%. As i'm not a habitually toxic player i only received a chat resstriction but even then i think it's unreasonable that jarvan can get off scotch for while i get hit with this.

replies.body: I mean yeah, people have rough games. You yourself went 1/14 and 3/17 recently. Just take some deep breaths, sit back, and play the game! It's not worth getting that upset about it.

Yeah alot of people dont take into consideration that this game is NOT played in a vaccuum. so getting mad at him for his kda when people will actively ignore thier teammates. If he is getting focused as a priority target and no one else is willing to lift a finger to help, guess what. he is gonna go 1/14 or something close. 
Alot of people will claim its a "Team game" but refuse to help thier teams. And yet they will treat the game like each lane/role is played in a vaccuum. Top cant invade bot...Jungle and Mid cant invade and pressure top while enemy jungle just shrugs and goes "not my lane? not my problem" then Blame lanes for getting repeatedly harrassed and 1v4'ed while the rest of the team acts like "Well its not affecting MY lane, so good luck" But suddenly when the fed enemy DOES start hammering bot lane or one shotting the other team, people will dismiss the player by using that resulting kda "Omg ur 1/14, u intentionaly fed. why u greifing! Report! report! 
They will not lift a finger to help a teammate who needs it. but instantly blame that player for the resulting kda after being hung out to rot.

It's not a rough game, i went 1/14 because i got dived under turret at level 2 both games while getting camped consistently. while i draw all the pressure top my other lanes are getting focused. this jarvan however, had no other factors affecting his gameplay except for his lack of a brain

my point exactly :) they wont lift a finger to help you when you are constantly getting camped because its "not my lane not my problem"
then turn around and use "Well u went 1/14 so obviously you must be inting. So this is your fault" 
But they will completely talk about how "its a team game, you have to play for the team". But are happy to leave you high and dry and ignore you when its convenient. "Oh you went 1/14 because the team refused to help? well thats ur own fault, u must be bad! HURRRRRR" 

Sorry you had to deal with that.
